backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor providing user profile management, per-user knowledge base CRUD, and chat history storage with access-control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing pre-chat quick option features, involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication, profile setup flow, and switching between Chat and Knowledge pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Unauthenticated landing UI with login button, branding, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Sign‑out button that clears identity and React Query cache.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Styled chat bubble component formatting user or assistant messages with timestamps.
frontend/src/components/chat/PreChatQuic: Component rendering four quick-start chat option buttons that return predefined prompts.
frontend/src/components/knowledge/Knowle: Displays a knowledge entry with its question and answer and provides edit and delete actions with confirmation.
Dialog form for adding or editing a knowledge entry with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the app header with navigation between chat and knowledge views and shows the current user profile.
Layout wrapper providing header, main content area, and footer for the application.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Provides chat history fetching and message sending, including knowledge-based response generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and saves the current user's profile using backend actor queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useKnowledgeEntries.t: Fetches, adds, updates, and deletes knowledge entries through backend actor mutations and queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes with vibrant colors, plus base element styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Implements the chat interface, showing message history, input handling, quick options, and sending messages with identity awareness.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBasePage.tsx: Displays and manages knowledge base entries with add/edit dialogs and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, fonts, shadows, and plugins based on theme CSS variables.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, requirements, and design direction for the AI assistant application.
